mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId} AND status != "cancelled"

SELECT booking.booking_id as booking_id, booking.emp_id as emp_id, booking.session_start as session_start, booking.status as status, employees.first_name as first_name, employees.last_name as last_name FROM bookings as booking JOIN employees as employees ON booking.emp_id = employees.emp_id WHERE booking.user_email = #{userEmail} ORDER BY session_start DESC
SELECT Hour(session_start) FROM bookings WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND DATE(session_start) = #{selDate} AND status != "cancelled" ORDER BY session_start
mapper.update: UPDATE bookings SET emp_Id = #{empId}, session_start = #{sessionStart}, status = #{status} WHERE booking_Id = #{bookingId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE bookings SET status = 'cancelled' WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId}
